long_description:
# more_up_packs 
Upgrade your upgrade packs so you can have even higher stats!  
Affected stats are health and breath.  

## Higher stats, whaaaa?
[The original upgrade_packs mod by Krock](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Krock/upgrade_packs/ "Link to the upgrade_packs minetest ContentDB site") added four slots to the players inventory which they were able to fill with either +10 Health or +5 Breath each.  
Using only that mod a player could have up to +40HP or +20 Breath.  
I however thought that this wouldn't be enough for **some** reason.  

### So I've added more packs.
Introducing:  
>#### +20HP  
>#### +30HP  
>#### +40HP  
>#### +50HP  
>as well as  
>#### +10 Breath  
>#### +15 Breath  
>#### +20 Breath

## That's all fine and dandy but how do you even craft them?
In order to craft one of these packs you take the previous level and surround it with the right items in order to upgrade the upgrade pack.

### +10HP (from [the original upgrade_packs mod by Krock](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Krock/upgrade_packs/ "Link to the upgrade_packs minetest ContentDB site")) 

>To craft a +10HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 copper ingots  
>4 mese crystals  
>1 glass bottle  
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put copper ingots into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put an empty glass bottle into the middle spot. Fill in the rest with mese crystals.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Rejuvination**  

### +20HP  

>To craft a +20HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 gold ingots  
>2 mese crystals  
>2 obsidian shards  
>1 +10HP upgrade pack
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put gold ingots into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +10HP upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place mese crystals above and below it. Fill in the sides with obsidian shards.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Prolonged Life**  

###  +30HP  

>To craft a +30HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 diamonds  
>2 mese crystals  
>2 obsidian  
>1 +20HP upgrade pack
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put diamonds into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +20HP upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place mese crystals into the slots above and below it. Fill in the sides with obsidian.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Fountain of Life**  

### +40HP  

>#### IF [mtg_plus](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site") is used
>
>>To craft a +40HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>>4 diamond blocks  
>>2 mese blocks  
>>2 obsidian bricks  
>>1 +30HP upgrade pack
>>
>>##### Arrange it like this:
>>
>>>Put diamond blocks into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +30HP upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place mese blocks above and below it. Fill in the sides with obsidian bricks.  
>
>#### IF [mtg_plus](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site") is NOT used
>
>>To craft a +40HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>>4 diamond blocks  
>>2 mese blocks  
>>2 obsidian blocks  
>>1 +30HP upgrade pack
>>
>>##### Arrange it like this:
>>
>>>Put diamond blocks into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +30HP upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place mese blocks above and below it. Fill in the sides with obsidian blocks.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Approaching Invincibility**  

### +50HP  

>#### IF [mtg_plus](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site") is used
>
>>To craft a +50HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>>4 aggregated diamond blocks (from [the mtg_plus mod by Wuzzy](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site"))  
>>2 mese blocks  
>>2 gold-framed obsidian bricks (from [the mtg_plus mod by Wuzzy](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site"))  
>>1 +40HP upgrade pack
>>
>>##### Arrange it like this:
>>
>>>Put aggregated diamond blocks into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +40HP upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place mese blocks above and below it. Fill in the sides with gold-framed obsidan bricks.  
>
>#### IF [mtg_plus](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site") is NOT used
>
>>To craft a +50HP upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>>3 diamond blocks  
>>3 mese blocks  
>>2 obsidian bricks  
>>1 +40HP upgrade pack
>>
>>##### Arrange it like this:
>>
>>>Put mese blocks into the top left and top right as well as the lower center of the crafting grid. Do the same with diamond blocks, but mirrored; lower left and right and upper center. Place a +40HP upgrade pack into the center. Fill in the rest with obsidian bricks.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Cheating Death**  

### +5 Breath (from [the original upgrade_packs mod by Krock](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Krock/upgrade_packs/ "Link to the upgrade_packs minetest ContentDB site"))

>To craft a +5 Breath upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 tin ingots  
>4 mese crystals  
>1 steel bottle  
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put tin ingots into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put an empty steel bottle into the middle spot. Fill in the rest with mese crystals.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Breathing in Deeply**  

### +10 Breath  

>To craft a +10 Breath upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 tin ingots  
>4 mese crystals  
>1 +5 Breath upgrade pack  
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put bronze ingots into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +5 Breath upgrade pack into the middle spot. Fill in the rest with mese crystals.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Becoming Amphibious**  

### +15 Breath  

>To craft a +15 Breath upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 steel ingots  
>2 mese crystals  
>2 obsidian shards  
>1 +10 Breath upgrade pack  
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put steel ingots into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +10 Breath upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place obsidian shards above and below it. Fill in the sides with mese crystals.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Growing Gills**  

### +20 Breath  

>To craft a +20 Breath upgrade pack, you'll need:  
>4 obsidian shards  
>2 mese crystals  
>2 diamonds  
>1 +15 Breath upgrade pack  
>
>#### Arrange it like this:
>
>>Put obsidian shards into the four corners of the crafting grid. Put a +15 Breath upgrade pack into the middle spot. Place diamonds aboe and below it. Fill in the sides with mese crystals.  
>
>#### Unlocked award IF [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site") is used:
>
>>**Underwater Breathing**  

## They're even translated into ***some*** languages

Translations currently cover these languages:

### English ²
### German ²
### Dutch ¹ ² ³
### French ¹ ⁵
### Spanish ¹ ² ⁴

¹ using [Deepl](https://deepl.com/translator)  
² from previous knowledge like classes or culture  
³ derived from similarities with other languages, e.g. German and Dutch  
⁴ with outside help  
⁵ pending proofreading  
  
A template for the translation can be found on the associated GitHub page.

## Last but not least: Installation and dependencies

Installation of a mod must not be hard. Simply head into your minetest 5.0+ game and go to the ***Content*** tab. Tap on ***browse online content*** and wait for it to load up the available mod list. Using the search bar you have to make sure to install these mods:  
  
### [upgrade_packs](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Krock/upgrade_packs/ "Link to the upgrade_packs minetest ContentDB site")
the base that brings the core functionality. Must-have for this mod.  
### [mtg_plus](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mtg_plus/ "Link to the mtg_plus minetest ContentDB site")
optionally used for the +50HP upgrade pack to make it harder to craft.  
### [awards](https://content.luanti.org/packages/rubenwardy/awards/ "Link to the awards minetest ContentDB site")
if you'd like to be rewarded by a popup for your efforts.
### [more_up_packs](https://content.luanti.org/packages/nolombic/more_up_packs/)
this mod.  

### Make sure the mods are enabled on your world! Otherwise they won't do anything but sit around unused.

Alternatively download the individual mods from their respective pages, extract their .zip files, maybe rename them accordingly, and move them to your mods folder.

## Thank you for showing interest in my silly little mod
Yours sincerely,  
nolombic
name: more_up_packs
short_description: Upgrade your upgrade packs so you can have even higher stats!
title: More Upgrade Packs
